DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this trial is to show that PTH(1-84) is superior to alendronate in reducing back pain intensity over a 24-week treatment period in postmenopausal women with an osteoporosis related vertebral fracture(s). Secondly the objectives are to investigate any differences in patient reported outcomes between the two treatment arms over a 24-week treatment period in postmenopausal women with an osteoporosis related vertebral fracture(s).
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of PTH(1-84) or Alendronate on Reduction of Back Pain in Postmenopausal Women With an Osteoporosis Related Vertebral Fracture(s) (FP-005-IM)
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal women with a Tscore â‰¤ 1.5 SD and at least one osteoporosis related vertebral fracture. Chronic back pain. Previous/current treatment and medical history.
